dimensions.label: Creativity Level
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will think outside the box and take calculated risks to find innovative solutions.
Your FarTwin will methodically analyze data and evaluate options before proposing a solution.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be friendly, approachable, and enjoy meeting new people.
Your FarTwin will prefer smaller groups or one-on-one interactions and might take time to warm up to new social situations.

dimensions.label: Financial Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach money management?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving and investing, aiming to minimize expenses.
Your FarTwin will enjoy treating themselves to luxury items or dining out and won't hesitate to splurge occasionally.

dimensions.label: Critical Thinking Skill
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin evaluate information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will question facts and sources, preferring evidence-based information over assumptions.
Your FarTwin will approach new ideas with an open mind, trusting their instincts and intuition.

dimensions.label: Education Value
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn from others?

options.description: Your FarTwin values in-depth knowledge and thorough explanations, preferring to absorb information through reading or lectures.
Your FarTwin prefers hands-on learning, experimentation, and real-world applications over theoretical foundations.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin prefers to weigh risks and consequences before making decisions, aiming for stability.
Your FarTwin enjoys taking calculated risks and embracing uncertainty, seeking new challenges and experiences.

dimensions.label: Self-Presentation Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin present themselves online?

options.description: Your FarTwin values honesty and transparency, sharing personal experiences and thoughts without pretension.
Your FarTwin presents a polished, put-together image online, carefully managing their digital persona to align with their public identity.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle time constraints?

options.description: Your FarTwin prioritizes precision and attention to detail, often spending more time on a single task than necessary.
Your FarTwin is adaptable and able to adjust their schedule as needed, valuing efficiency over strict timelines.
